full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Contract Title and Reference Number
* English: **Drilling, Boreholes, and Environmental Services**
* French: **Forganage, trous de sonde et services environnementaux**
* Reference Number: **WS3664662666-Doc3664701217**
#### Publication Details
* Publication Date: **04 October, 2022**
* Tender Closing Date and Time: **01 November, 2022 at 14:00 Central Daylight Time (CDT)**
* Expected Contract Start Date: **16 November, 2022**
* Expected Contract End Date: **31 March, 2023**
#### Tender Details
* Contract Category: **Services (SRV)**
* Tender Type: **Request for Proposal**
* Tender Method: **Competitive - Open Bidding**
* Evaluation Criteria: **Lowest Price**
#### Client Information
* Contracting Entity: **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
* Client Address: **11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5**
* Contact: Matthew Keenan (SPAC/PSPC), matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**
#### Goods and Services Description
The Royal Military College of Canada (RMC)/Environmental Sciences Group (ESG) requires high resolution site characterization services using a direct push drill rig with an Ultra-Violet Optical Screening Tool (UVOST) and a hydraulic profiling tool (HPT) for determination of stratigraphic permeability and saturated hydraulic conductivity estimation. The services also include continuous core sampling through direct push borehole drilling and monitoring well installation for an environmental assessment at three sites at 4 Wing Cold Lake, located in Cold Lake, Alberta.
#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Delivery
* Cold Lake, Alberta

#### Attachments
No attachments are provided.
#### Additional Notes
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the tender closing date and time. All bids submitted after the tender closing date and time
